mcmc.setup.question: Would you like to participate in anonymous analytics data collection?
mcmc.setup.info.1: This mod collects analytics data and automatically sends crash reports to modpack authors
mcmc.setup.info.2: Participating helps modpack authors find issues faster and see useful data about their modpacks
mcmc.nopack: Modpack isn't set up properly! Open MCMC Settings from options menu
mcmc.account_linked: Your MCMC account has been linked with your Minecraft account!
